Package org.opendaylight.controller.config.manager.impl.osgi

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeanToOsgiServiceManager
    Registers instantiated beans as OSGi services and unregisters these services if beans are destroyed.
    BeanToOsgiServiceManager.OsgiRegistration  
    BlankTransactionServiceTracker
    Every time factory is added or removed, blank transaction is triggered to handle ModuleFactory.getDefaultModules(org.opendaylight.controller.config.api.DependencyResolverFactory, org.osgi.framework.BundleContext) functionality.
    BlankTransactionServiceTrackerTest  
    BundleContextBackedModuleFactoriesResolver
    Retrieves list of currently registered Module Factories using bundlecontext.
    BundleContextBackedModuleFactoriesResolverTest  
    ConfigManagerActivator  
    ExtensibleBundleTracker<T>
    Extensible bundle tracker.
    ExtensibleBundleTrackerTest  
    ModuleFactoryBundleTracker
    OSGi extender that listens for bundle activation events.
    ModuleFactoryBundleTrackerTest  
    RefreshingSCPModuleInfoRegistryTest
